meta.title: Experiences at Hostel Brikette – Terrace Bar, Hikes & Concierge
meta.description: Sip sunset spritzes, join curated hikes, and use our digital concierge to plan effortless Amalfi Coast days.

hero.title: Make the Most of Your Time
hero.description: We've walked the trails, tested the transportation, and eaten at the trattorias. Our guides cover beach access, day hikes, boat trips, and budget-friendly eats—all updated for the current season. You get itineraries that actually work, not generic listicles.

bar.title: Sunset terrace bar
bar.description: Our clifftop terrace becomes a lounge every evening with spritzes, Campanian wines, and occasional guest DJs.
highlights: Signature spritzes and local wines served ice-cold.
Social nights and tastings during peak weeks.
Panoramic views perfect for golden-hour photos.
bar.imageAlt: Guests toasting on the Hostel Brikette terrace at sunset.

hikes.title: Guided hikes & day trips
hikes.description: We help you plan Sentiero degli Dei hikes, shared shuttles, and ferry-connected day trips across the Amalfi Coast.
highlights: Offline maps and transit schedules refreshed every morning.
Staff-led walks when the trails are busiest.
hikes.imageAlt: Hostel guests hiking the Path of the Gods above the Amalfi Coast.

concierge.title: Always-on digital concierge
concierge.description: Receive real-time alerts on ferry changes, restaurant openings, and tailored ideas that match your pace and budget.
highlights: WhatsApp and Messenger replies from our team.
Automated alerts for bus and ferry adjustments.
Personal suggestions built around your plans.
concierge.imageAlt: Phone screen showing the Hostel Brikette digital concierge chat.

items.question: Do I need to reserve experiences in advance?
answer: Most terrace evenings and hikes are confirmed on the day at reception.
For private tours or boat trips we can hold a spot—just message the concierge at least 24 hours ahead.

cta.title: Ready to plan your Amalfi Coast days?
cta.subtitle: Book your bed, skim the bar lineup, and tell us what you’d like to experience—we’ll handle the details.
